WorkItem.Description: Apparently creating water at the edge of the map is a bad idea.  It flows off the edge and into oblivion; which in turn has a nasty affect on the performance of the app.
WorkItem.Summary: Stop water at the edge of the world

Comments.Message:
Surely you speak of the old techcraft engine, the rewrite currently in the newtake project has no water flow. 

But i keep your bug report, we will try to adress this when we will re-implement water flow !
